    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: BaseConnection
        Send a websocket Close frame, StatusCode.NORMAL, without a reason.

        Basic usage: results in an non-blocking async write, then connection close.

        Specified by:
        close in interface BaseConnection
        See Also:
        StatusCode, BaseConnection.close(int, String)

      • close

        public void close(int statusCode,
         String reason)
        Description copied from interface: BaseConnection
        Send a websocket Close frame, with status code.

        Advanced usage: results in an non-blocking async write, then connection close.

        Specified by:
        close in interface BaseConnection
        Parameters:
        statusCode - the status code
        reason - the (optional) reason. (can be null for no reason)
        See Also:
        StatusCode

      • ping

        public <C> void ping(C context,
            Callback<C> callback,
            byte[] payload)
          throws IOException
        Send a single ping messages.

        NIO style with callbacks, allows for knowledge of successful ping send.

        Use @OnWebSocketFrame and monitor Pong frames

        Specified by:
        ping in interface WebSocketConnection
        Throws:

             Callback<C> callback,
             byte[] buf,
             int offset,

        Send a a binary message.

      • write

        public <C> void write(C context,
             Callback<C> callback,
             String message)
           throws IOException
        Send a series of text messages.

        NIO style with callbacks, allows for concurrent results of the entire write operation. (Callback is only called once at the end of processing all of the messages)

        Specified by:
        write in interface WebSocketConnection
        Throws:
        IOException
